text: Proctor Apollo was an unnamed Gold man who was the Proctor of House Apollo at The Institute of Mars during the 737-738 school year.
name: Proctor Apollo

text: Proctor Apollo was a large Peerless Scarred with curly blond hair cut tight to his head and a dusky, godlike face with a chin carved from marble.
name: Proctor Apollo

text: Along with Proctor Jupiter, Proctor Apollo was one of the ringleaders of the Proctors' attempt to rig the Institute in favour of Adrius au Augustus.
name: Proctor Apollo

name: Proctor Apollo
